function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to medical care for minority groups during pandemics","Impact":"Higher mortality rates for minority groups","Mitigation":"Increase access to medical care for minority groups during pandemics","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile medical units","People":"Minority groups","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"},{"Description":"Poor living and sanitary conditions in slums leading to difficulty in containing the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of COVID-19 in slums","Mitigation":"Improvement of living conditions, access to basic infrastructure services, and provision of medical care in slums","Technologies":"Sanitation infrastructure, community health centers","People":"Urban poor, slum dwellers","Owner":"Local government, NGOs"},{"Description":"Lack of access to medical care and basic services in informal developments","Impact":"Inability to comply with health recommendations and containment measures","Mitigation":"Providing access to medical care, clean water, and economic support for informal developments","Technologies":"Mobile medical units, community outreach programs","People":"Communities in informal developments","Owner":"Local government, NGOs"}]}
